highLevelSummary: Add an optional phoneNumber query parameter and an optional lastLoginAt response field to the existing GET /api/users/:id endpoint. The change must be strictly backwards-compatible: no existing fields may be removed, renamed, or have their types changed, and existing clients must continue to work without modification.

apis.name: GET /api/users/:id
apis.description: Retrieve user profile by ID. Now accepts optional phoneNumber query parameter and returns optional lastLoginAt field in response.
